author: Kim Holcomb
title: Raise a glass to Cheeky and Dry, Seattle's first non-alcoholic bottle shop
text:
SEATTLE — A new bottle shop can help you shake a cocktail or sip champagne without fear of being over-served.
Family-run
Cheeky and Dry is stocked with the latest in zero-proof spirits, wine and beer – the first non-alcoholic bottle shop in Seattle.
There are also bitters, mixers and other options for creating quality mocktails.
Yura and Kirstin Vracko opened the doors on Nov. 9 and have already needed to re-stock the shelves.
"The reception's been insane,” Kirstin said. "I've had numerous people say, 'I've been sober for 22 years and I've been looking for you, I've been waiting for you.’"
The shop carries bottles made in the Northwest and nationally/internationally. Customers are able to try before they buy at a “tasting station.”
"It's nice to have something special, an adult drink,” Yura said.
The Vrackos didn't open the business to capitalize on a trend. Cheeky and Dry is their life, in more ways than one.
"This whole project started when Yura went to rehab,” Kirstin said.
It was May 2023, and his recovery quickly led to better mental and physical health. Kirstin also decided to stop drinking. Combined, they’ve lost roughly 50 pounds.
“We laugh like we haven't laughed in years. We feel really good,” Kristin said. “No more CPAP, no more blood pressure medication. It's just been life changing."
Yura said opening the business has also helped him connect with other people on a similar journey.
“The thing that gets me is just being part of other people's lives,” he said. "When you get this room full of people tasting things and trying things, it's just so exciting. We're all headed to a better place of becoming better people or more in touch with life."
Being part of their immediate community is also important, so they opened the shop in Phinney Ridge - their neighborhood of more than 20 years.
Kirstin said the support they’ve received is incredible. Even the bar across the street has started sending customers their way.
"Being part of being able to help each other has been really important and special to us,” Kirstin said.
Cheeky and Dry is located at 6120 Phinney Ave. N. and is open Tuesday – Saturday from noon to 7 p.m.
[KING 5's Evening](/evening) celebrates the Northwest. Contact us:

author: Adrian Zmudzinski
title: Grayscale lança dois novos produtos de Bitcoin com foco em resultados
text:
A grande gestora de ativos de criptomoedas Grayscale Investments anunciou dois novos fundos negociados em bolsa (ETFs) voltados para resultados de Bitcoin.
De acordo com um anúncio de 2 de abril, os novos produtos são o Grayscale Bitcoin Covered Call ETF (BTCC) e o Grayscale Bitcoin Premium Income ETF (BPI). De acordo com um e-mail enviado ao Cointelegraph, os dois novos fundos de Bitcoin (BTC) devem gerar receita aproveitando a volatilidade do BTC:
“Ambas as estratégias podem ser consideradas uma fonte alternativa de renda com menor correlação com investimentos tradicionais voltados para geração de renda.”
Um produto derivativo complexo
O produto Bitcoin Covered Call busca capturar os prêmios mais altos e maximizar o potencial de geração de renda. A Grayscale sugere que ele pode servir como complemento à exposição direta ao Bitcoin.
A estratégia do fundo envolve a venda sistemática de opções de compra (calls) muito próximas ao preço à vista. A expectativa é que, devido à alta volatilidade histórica do Bitcoin, isso gere renda por meio do recebimento dos prêmios das opções.
Por outro lado, o produto Bitcoin Premium Income busca equilibrar a participação no potencial de valorização com certo grau de geração de renda. Ele é pensado como uma alternativa à posse direta de Bitcoin e visa um equilíbrio entre crescimento e retorno.
Esse fundo escreve sistematicamente opções de compra com preços de exercício bem acima do valor atual (fora do dinheiro) sobre ETFs de Bitcoin, incluindo o Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) e o Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust (BTC). O anúncio afirma:
“Ao focar nesse tipo de estratégia de venda de calls, o BPI permite que os investidores participem de boa parte do potencial de valorização do Bitcoin, ao mesmo tempo que se beneficiam de uma possível renda com dividendos.”
A Grayscale Investments afirma que ambos os novos produtos permitirão uma fonte diferenciada de receita, “oferecendo uma renda não correlacionada para os investidores”. Além disso, os novos derivativos terão distribuições mensais e gestão sistemática de opções.
Mais um registro da Grayscale
No início desta semana, a Grayscale também entrou com um pedido para listar um fundo de índice (ETF) composto por uma cesta diversificada de criptomoedas spot. Esse novo produto inclui Bitcoin, Ether (ETH), XRP, Solana (SOL) e Cardano (ADA).
No final de março, a bolsa de valores Nasdaq também apresentou um pedido à Comissão de Valores Mobiliários dos EUA (SEC) para listar o ETF de Avalanche spot da Grayscale. O site da Grayscale lista 28 produtos cripto, dos quais 25 são derivativos de um único ativo, e três são diversificados.
A Grayscale também está entre as gestoras de ativos que atualmente aguardam a aprovaçã de seu ETF de XRP spot, além de outros produtos. Entre eles, estão o pedido de ETF de Cardano spot e a conversão do Litecoin Trust em ETF.

author: Carmen Mörwald
title: „Tomorrowland"-Inferno: Festival-Bühne in Flammen - Veranstalter reagiert
text:
„Tomorrowland“-Inferno: Festival-Bühne in Flammen – Veranstalter reagiert
Ein Feuer zerstörte die Hauptbühne des „Tomorrowland“-Festivals. Die Ursache des Brandes ist noch unklar – ebenso, ob das Festival nun stattfinden kann.
Update vom 17. Juli, 6.40 Uhr: Bereits im Vorfeld des vergangenen „Tomorrowland“-Festivals hatte das Team betont, dass das Design der ikonischen Hauptbühne vollständig in Eigenregie entstanden sei – von den ersten Ideen bis hin zur finalen Umsetzung. Über zwei Jahre hinweg habe das hauseigene Kreativteam mit viel Hingabe an der spektakulären Kulisse gearbeitet. „Jahrelange Liebe und Leidenschaft sind in den Aufbau dieser Bühne geflossen. Die Teams sind am Boden zerstört“, sagte Festivalsprecherin Debby Wilmsen am Mittwochabend (16. Juli) auf einer Pressekonferenz.
Brand zerstört Hauptbühne von „Tomorrowland“-Festival: DJs zeigen sich bestürzt
„Ich habe das gerade überall in den News gesehen. Es bricht mir das Herz“, so Charlotte de Witte, die am Samstag beim „Tomorrowland“ spielen sollte, bei Instagram. Auch die DJs Armin van Buuren und Boris Brejcha zeigten sich betroffen, während Afrojack vor allem erleichtert ist, dass es keine Verletzten gab. Das Duo Blasterjaxx lobte die Crew für ihren Einsatz: „Respekt an die Crew, dass sie es dennoch stattfinden lassen wollen.“ Anouk Matton, die auf der Hauptbühne auftreten sollte, sagte noch vor ihrem Set im Ushuaïa auf Ibiza: „Ich bin völlig geschockt … Ich hoffe sehr, dass das Festival trotzdem stattfinden kann.“
Selbst das konkurrierende Festival „Parookaville“ meldete sich zu Wort und kommentierte unter einem Beitrag von „Tomorrowland“: „Wir schicken all unsere Liebe.“
Update vom 16, Juli, 22.37 Uhr: Auch eine Sprecherin der Feuerwehr bestätigte, dass es bislang keine Verletzten durch den Brand auf dem Gelände des „Tomorrowland“-Festivals gebe. Rettungsdienste sind vor Ort, so die belgische Nachrichtenagentur Belga. Der Fokus liege aktuell auf der Sicherheit der anwesenden Mitarbeiter.
Trotz des Brandes und der zerstörten Hauptbühne soll das Festival stattfinden. Das berichtet die Deutsche Presse-Agentur (dpa) unter Berufung auf eine Festival-Sprecherin.
Nach Brand auf dem „Tomorrowland“-Gelände: Festival-Veranstalter äußert sich
Update vom 16. Juli, 20.58 Uhr: Jetzt hat sich auch der Veranstalter des „Tomorrowland“ zu Wort gemeldet. Auf der Homepage spricht man von einem „schweren Zwischenfall und Brand“ auf der Hauptbühne. Diese sei „schwer beschädigt“ worden. Immerhin könne man bestätigen, dass niemand verletzt sei.
Dennoch werde der Campingplatz „Dreamville“ am Donnerstag, 17. Juli, wie geplant für Besucher öffnen. Zudem würden alle sogenannten Global Journey-Aktivitäten rund um das Festival in Brüssel und Antwerpen „wie geplant“ stattfinden.
Doch was heißt das für das Festival an sich? „Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck an der Lösung des Festivalwochenendes (Freitag – Samstag – Sonntag)“, heißt es vom Veranstalter. Neue Informationen will man „so bald wie möglich bekannt geben.“
Erstmeldung vom 17. Juli: Es sollte das Musik-Highlight des Sommers werden, doch jetzt steht alles in Flammen! Die gigantische Hauptbühne des weltberühmten Tomorrowland-Festivals in Belgien ist am Mittwochabend komplett abgebrannt. Nur zwei Tage vor dem offiziellen Start des Mega-Events verwandelte sich die spektakuläre Bühne in ein Flammenmeer.
Kurz vor Festival-Beginn: „Tomorrowland“-Bühne plötzlich in Flammen
Schockierende Bilder zeigen eine gewaltige schwarze Rauchwolke, die über dem Festivalgelände im belgischen Boom bei Antwerpen aufsteigt. Laut dem belgischem Rundfunk BRF waren während des Brandes auch Geräusche von Feuerwerkskörpern zu hören. Die Hauptbühne ist nahezu vollständig zerstört.
„Die Rettungskräfte sind vor Ort; unsere oberste Priorität ist jetzt die Sicherheit“, erklärte Festivalsprecherin Debby Wilmsen der niederländischen Tageszeitung De Telegraaf. Menschen in der Umgebung wird geraten, Fenster und Türen geschlossen zu halten.
„Tomorrowland“-Gelände wegen Brand evakuiert – Unklar, ob Festival stattfinden kann
Zum Zeitpunkt des Unglücks befanden sich keine Festivalbesucher auf dem Gelände, aber rund 1.000 Mitarbeiter, die mit den Vorbereitungen beschäftigt waren. Wie der flämische Sender VRT berichtet, wurde das gesamte Gelände evakuiert. Ob es Verletzte gibt, ist derzeit noch unklar.
Das Tomorrowland-Festival sollte am Freitag beginnen und bis Sonntag dauern. Jährlich strömen rund 400.000 Techno- und Elektro-Fans aus aller Welt zu dem Event. Für dieses Jahr waren Star-DJs wie ArminVan Buuren, Charlotte De Witte und Swedish House Mafia, David Guetta und Robin Schulz angekündigt. Ob das Festival wie geplant stattfinden kann, ist nach dem verheerenden Brand völlig unklar. (sp/cln)

author: Daniela Tostón
title: Previsión meteorológica en Barcelona: alerta amarilla por lluvias
text: Previsión meteorológica en Barcelona: alerta amarilla por lluvias AEMET publica su pronóstico para hoy: descubre si hará sol, lloverá o bajarán las temperaturas La [Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET)](http://www.aemet.es/es/eltiempo/prediccion/avisos?w=hoy) ha activado la alerta amarilla por lluvias durante este viernes en el litoral barcelonés, donde se encuentra Barcelona. El municipio se verá marcado por una climatología variable, pues durante la madrugada predominarán cielos cubiertos y, desde las 06:00 horas, la nubosidad disminuirá y lloverá para después dar paso a cielos muy nubosos con tormenta hasta las 18:00, cuando terminarán las tormentas . De esta forma, se producirán lluvias débiles que dejarán unos 0.1 litros por metro cuadrado en torno a las 11:00 y 0.1 litros a las 16:00. Además, tanto por la mañana como por la tarde podrían aparecer tormentas. Los termómetros situarán la temperatura máxima en valores similares a los de ayer, con 22 grados, y las mínimas rondarán los 16, muy próximas a los 17 de ayer . Soplarán ligeras brisas de dirección nordeste. A continuación se indica la evolución semanal del tiempo en Barcelona; concretamente, a la izquierda se muestra el estado del cielo de cada día junto a la probabilidad de precipitaciones, seguido de la temperatura mínima y máxima que registrarán los termómetros. El tiempo de mañana Por otra parte, mañana se espera un sábado de abundantes nubes con lluvia desde la madrugada hasta mitad del día, aunque la nubosidad irá a más a partir de las 12:00. Las temperaturas en Barcelona permanecerán en los mismos términos que las de hoy, con máximas de 22 grados y mínimas de 16 (con en torno a 17 grados de sensación térmica mínima). También se sucederán vientos flojos de dirección nordeste. El tiempo de pasado mañana Para el domingo podrían darse precipitaciones , pues todo el día albergará un panorama encapotado con lluvia. Los termómetros experimentarán pocos cambios, moviéndose entre los 18 y 21 grados. El viento no será una preocupación: soplarán ligeras brisas de dirección nordeste. El tiempo en otros municipios Con respecto a otros municipios próximos, se vivirá una jornada caracterizada por cielos muy nubosos con lluvia en [L' Hospitalet de Llobregat](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-l-hospitalet-de-llobregat-viernes_3995093/), entre la madrugada y mitad del día, que dejarán paso a un panorama de abundantes nubes con tormenta hasta última hora de la noche. La AEMET no espera lluvias por la mañana, pero sí que habrá precipitaciones débiles en la segunda mitad del día. Las temperaturas rondarán valores mínimos de 14 grados y llegarán a los 22 de máxima. El tiempo en [Sabadell](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-sabadell-viernes_3995094/) vendrá marcado por cielos muy nubosos en la franja que va de la madrugada a las 12:00; y cielos nubosos con tormenta en lo que resta de día. Se pueden producir lluvias débiles, con mayor probabilidad a las 12:00 y a las 17:00. En lo que respecta a las temperaturas, la mínima estará por debajo de 11 grados centígrados y la máxima será de 22. Esta es la previsión meteorológica en otras localidades: [Castelldefels](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-castelldefels-viernes_3995092/)[Tarragona](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-tarragona-viernes_3995161/)[Girona](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-girona-viernes_3995107/)[Figueres](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-figueres-viernes_3995106/)[Lleida](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-lleida-viernes_3995130/)[Palma](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-palma-viernes_3995090/)[Cartagena](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-cartagena-viernes_3995141/)[Soria](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-soria-viernes_3995160/)[Pamplona](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-pamplona-viernes_3995143/)[Alicante](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-alicante-viernes_3995069/)[Santiago de Compostela](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-santiago-de-compostela-viernes_3995104/)[Gandia](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-gandia-viernes_3995166/)[Guadalajara](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-guadalajara-viernes_3995110/)[Granada](https://www.elconfidencial.com/el-tiempo/2024-11-01/el-tiempo-en-granada-viernes_3995108/) * Datos del tiempo en Barcelona con información elaborada utilizando, entre otras, la obtenida de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET). En cualquier caso, esta información debe considerarse provisional a la espera de próximas actualizaciones. La [Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET)](http://www.aemet.es/es/eltiempo/prediccion/avisos?w=hoy) ha activado la alerta amarilla por lluvias durante este viernes en el litoral barcelonés, donde se encuentra Barcelona. El municipio se verá marcado por una climatología variable, pues durante la madrugada predominarán cielos cubiertos y, desde las 06:00 horas, la nubosidad disminuirá y lloverá para después dar paso a cielos muy nubosos con tormenta hasta las 18:00, cuando terminarán las tormentas . [Barcelona](https://www.elconfidencial.com/tags/lugares/barcelona-2409/)

author: Liam
title: Why California declared a state of emergency over bird flu
text:
Officials in California have declared a state of emergency over the spread of bird flu, which is ravaging dairy cows in the state and causing sporadic illness in people in the US.
Here’s what you need to know.
How did bird flu spread in the US? The virus, also known as Type A H5N, has been spreading among wild birds, commercial poultry and many mammal species for years. The disease was first found in American dairy cattle in March. Since then, bird flu has been confirmed in at least 866 flocks in 16 states.
According to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), more than sixty people in eight states have been infected, with mostly mild illnesses. Almost all of these were farm workers who were directly exposed to infected dairy cattle or poultry.
One person in Louisiana has been hospitalized with the nation’s first known serious illness caused by the virus, health officials said this week. That patient was infected through a herd in the backyard.
In addition to direct contact with farm animals and wild birds, the H5N1 virus can be spread through raw milk. Pasteurized milk is safe to drink because the heat treatment kills the virus, according to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
There have been no reports of person-to-person transmission.
How did it spread in California? California is the largest milk-producing state in the U.S., and three-quarters of the nation’s infected herds, about 650, are in the state.
The state has been looking for bird flu in large milk tanks during processing, and the virus was discovered earlier this month at four Southern California dairy farms after being found in the state’s Central Valley since August.
The detection at Southern California farms made clear that the state needed “a shift from regional containment to statewide monitoring and response,” California Governor Gavin Newsom said in his emergency declaration.
What does the emergency declaration do? The declaration allows the state to better position state personnel and supplies to respond to the outbreak, Newsom said.
“This proclamation is a targeted action to ensure government agencies have the resources and flexibility they need to quickly respond to this outbreak,” Newsom said in a statement.

author: Business Matters
title: Keep Your Pipes From Freezing This Winter with These Simple Tips
text:
Holidays are a staple of the winter season, which comes with the beauty of snowy landscapes that we can witness from the warmth and comfort of our homes.
However, this beautiful and cozy season brings some problems for us as well. As the temperature drops, all homeowners have a united fear; frozen pipes. this isn’t just a mild inconvenience; this can lead to significant damage to your pipes which is costly to repair. Don’t worry though, you’ve come to the right place, as we will teach you how to take the preventative measures to
 avoid your pipes freezing this winter.
Understanding the damage and risk
Before we look into the preventative measures to keep pipes from freezing. Let’s understand why it happens in the first place. what happens is, the water inside the pipes reaches a freezing point, which causes it to turn into ice.
 Ice has a larger volume than water, which means it takes more space than in liquid form, in other words, it expands. This expansion exerts pressure on the walls of the pipes, it may be fine if it happens once, but when it is a repeated cycle of freezing and thawing, the pressure will cause a lot of damage that will start with just minor leaks, then it might cause them to burst.
Tips for prevention
there are a few simple tips and tricks that you can use and employ in your daily lives as cold weather precautions to avoid pipe damage;
Maintaining a consistent water temperature:
One of the main reasons for pipes to freeze is due to the water temperature being inconsistent. You should make sure that your home heating system is working, so your pipes don’t freeze. Even if you’re planning on leaving your home for a while, it’s wise to keep a minimal temperature maintained.
Insulation of the exposed pipes:
Pipes that are exposed to the harsh winter weather or are in areas that don’t receive heating such as your basements, attics, or crawl spaces, are particularly susceptible. Insulation of these pipes with foam sleeves or wrapping can provide an extra layer of protection.
Seal Leaks:
If your home walls have any gaps or cracks that can lead to cold air seeping in, you need to seal these areas immediately to prevent freezing air from reaching your pipes.
Allow your faucets to drip:
On nights that have extremely low temperatures, it’s smart to let your faucet drip. This way the pressure inside the pipes won’t build up. you can keep a bucket under the faucet so you don’t waste any water though.
Open Cabinet Doors:
If you have your pipes under cabinets like the kitchen faucet or the bathroom sink, you need to open the cabinet doors occasionally to let the warm air circulate the pipes.
Disconnect outdoor hoses:
Before extreme winters hit, and snow starts to fall, you need to disconnect as well as drain all the hose that are outdoors. Because if your hose is filled with water, it can freeze as well and cause pressure to build up in your pipes too, increasing the risk of frozen pipes or damaging them.
Consider Advanced solutions:
This hack is for those who live in extremely cold climates, install a
 temperature-controlled system that would maintain a steady temperature in your pipes on their own, or even a pipe heating cable as a permanent solution.
Conclusion:
Frozen pipes are not just a minor inconvenience for the winters, it’s a huge problem as it can damage your home and your pipes and would require extensive repairs that are costly too. So, by following these tips you can ensure regular maintenance to safeguard your home and avoid the extra hassle of dealing with your pipes freezing over the winter. Moreover, investing time and resources in preventative measures will not only alleviate the immediate burden but also give a sense of security and peace of mind. Remember,
 “An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.”
